body:
Hi,
I've recently noticed the elimination compasses don't work, will they get fixed soon? Sometimes, my compass seems to point at a player who has died...
body_tagged:
Hi,
I've recently noticed the elimination compasses don't work, will they get fixed soon? Sometimes, my compass seems to point at a player who has died...
title: Elimination compasses?

replies.body: Yeah, I've noticed that too, weird.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, I've noticed that too, weird.

replies.body:
They do work, automatically pointing towards the nearest player at all times. There appears to be a bug in which only the first compass in your inventory is updated though.

That would be a new bug if it points towards a dead player. Report at github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues if you can replicate it.
replies.body_tagged:
They do work, automatically pointing towards the nearest player at all times. There appears to be a bug in which only the first compass in your inventory is updated though.

That would be a new bug if it points towards a dead player. Report at github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues if you can replicate it.

replies.body: Having same issue as of 6-5-14 about 9:00a.m.  P.S. are multiple compasses with different names all pointing in the same direction part of the plan?  May just have been a one time event.
replies.body_tagged: Having same issue as of 6-5-14 about 9:00a.m.  P.S. are multiple compasses with different names all pointing in the same direction part of the plan?  May just have been a one time event.

replies.body: Kid pimento no if they are stacked it will stack to the different players
